MERGE INTO PAY0318D D USING ( SELECT #{uploadStatus} AS STATUS ,#{userId} AS USER_ID ,V.TOKEN_ID AS NEW_TOKEN_ID ,C.CUST_CRC_ID AS NEW_CUST_CRC_ID ,C.CARD_TYPE_ID AS NEW_CARD_TYPE ,C.CUST_CRC_TYPE_ID AS NEW_CREDIT_CARD_TYPE ,V.RESPONSE_CODE AS NEW_RESPONSE_CODE ,V.RESPONSE_DESC AS NEW_RESPONSE_DESC ,V.REMARK AS NEW_REMARK FROM (
SELECT #{item.tokenId} TOKEN_ID ,#{item.cardType} CARD_TYPE ,#{item.creditCardType} CREDIT_CARD_TYPE ,#{item.responseCode} RESPONSE_CODE ,#{item.responseDesc} RESPONSE_DESC ,#{item.remark} REMARK FROM DUAL
) V JOIN SAL0028D C ON C.CUST_CRC_TOKEN = V.TOKEN_ID
JOIN SYS0094M K ON K.CODE = V.RESPONSE_CODE
WHERE V.REMARK IS NOT NULL ) S ON (S.NEW_CUST_CRC_ID = D.CUST_CRC_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET D.STATUS = S.STATUS , D.UPD_DT = SYSDATE , D.UPD_USER_ID = S.USER_ID , D.REMARK = S.NEW_REMARK WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SEQUENCE_ID ,TOKEN_ID ,CUST_CRC_ID ,CARD_TYPE ,CREDIT_CARD_TYPE ,RESPONSE_CODE ,RESPONSE_DESC ,STATUS ,REMARK ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) VALUES ( PAY0318D_SEQUENCE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,S.NEW_TOKEN_ID ,S.NEW_CUST_CRC_ID ,S.NEW_CARD_TYPE ,S.NEW_CREDIT_CARD_TYPE ,S.NEW_RESPONSE_CODE ,S.NEW_RESPONSE_DESC ,S.STATUS ,S.NEW_REMARK ,SYSDATE ,S.USER_ID ,SYSDATE ,S.USER_ID )
